Key: ...Where am I?

(I looked around me, and the landscape seemed
to stretch out endlessly. It was as if I were in a
world from a movie.)
What's the matter? You look surprised.
Arusu...? Why are you... Wait, what is this place?

At this rate, the ending will be anticlimactic.
Nothing will happen, and we will never have
an answer.
Anticlimactic? What do you mean by that?
Show her more. Show her far beyond.
Beyond...? What do you mean, Arusu?

Wait, this place is... from before karaoke?
Wait... did I come back?

(But what was that place earlier? It seemed like
I'd gone back to the beginning...)
Shido Itsuka. I want you to decide something.

Arusu... I mean Maria, is that you? Where is
everyone? What... do you want me to decide?
Shido, you have been teaching me love.

Y-Yeah. That's why we're all together... hanging
out and experiencing different situations, right?

Yes. By doing so, I was able to obtain lots of
information. But I have yet to find out... what
love is.

Hm... You have a point... there. I don't know what
it is, either...
That's why... I want you to choose.
Choose? You said that before... To choose...

The people that have come here all have feelings
for you, Shido Itsuka. That is for certain.

I want to be by Shido Itsuka's side, I want him
to be mine... Is that feeling what you call love?
Well... I don't think that's everything.

I think so, too. However, there is no definitive
love in this world. Therefore... I am not able to
find out what's beyond.

"(What's beyond... The "Arusu" from earlier
mentioned the same thing.)"

So... Please choose. The person to whom you will
swear your love...
I can't... choose...

And show me... What the future holds... and how
deep love can go.

The future... with all the girls and Shido Itsuka.
The future that could have been, the future that
could be...
